short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control the speed of HTML5 video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will adjust the playback speed of any HTML5 video in the current tab. Just click on the extension and slide the bar to adjust the playback speed. Works on Facebook Video, Twitter, YouTube, Netflix, and many more services.
